description: Personnel security policy and procedures documentation, including roles, responsibilities, review frequency, and approval authority
Position risk designation documentation for all organizational positions, including screening criteria and annual review records
Personnel screening and background investigation records, including initial screening and rescreening documentation per FedRAMP requirements
Access authorization verification records for individuals accessing systems processing information requiring special protection
Personnel termination procedures and records, including evidence of system access disablement within one hour of termination
Exit interview documentation covering information security topics for terminated employees
Automated notification logs or mechanisms used to alert personnel of termination actions and disable system access
Personnel transfer procedures and records, including access authorization reviews and modifications completed within 24 hours
Signed access agreements (nondisclosure agreements, acceptable use agreements, rules of behavior) for all personnel with system access
Annual access agreement review and re-signature records
External provider personnel security requirements and compliance documentation, including contractual agreements
External provider notification records for personnel transfers and terminations (immediate for terminations, within 24 hours for transfers)
Formal personnel sanctions policy and process documentation for security and privacy policy violations
Personnel sanctions notification records to ISSO within 24 hours of sanction initiation
Organizational position descriptions incorporating security and privacy roles and responsibilities
